code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./App.css';import AddExpenseForm from'./components/AddExpenseForm';import ExpenseList from'./components/ExpenseList';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddExpenseComponent(){const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState([]);const addExpense=expense=>{setExpenses([...expenses,expense]);};const deleteExpense=id=>{setExpenses(expenses.filter(expense=>expense.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Register"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddExpenseForm,{onAddExpense:addExpense}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseList,{expenses:expenses,onDelete:deleteExpense})]});}export default AddExpenseComponent;
